    • ManageDeGame

      public ManageDeGame​(java.lang.String mode, java.lang.String playerName, java.lang.String... restArg)
      Main constructor of Contoller class
      Parameters:
      mode - - [0] Read bank from file, [1] Read bank from user input
      playerName - - Name of the player in first round
      restArg - - Maximum number of errors to be made in first round and path of file to read words (only when Mode = 0)
